answers.answer: I don't think it's a miscarriage. It sounds like your mucous plug. You can lies this at any time but usually if it's that early it will grow back. If you start having pains then I'd say go to the hospital.
I would def call the doctor or go in. It could be a sign of a incompetent cervix and you could be dilating without pain. Just the weight of the baby could make you dilate.

Update: i went into the hospital they observed me over night. This morning my blood tests showed i was low on blood,and the bleeding had stopped. Also the mucas plug did come out but he said it rebuilds itself. Im on bed rest with no sex no pop drinks or sweet food. Reason for that was my sugar level was kind of high. But i dont have diabetes..baby is doing good! Thanks for the help!
yay! so happy for you, follow those doctor's orders girl!

question: I just went to the bathroom when i wiped i seen a string looking type of blood like mucas im 17 weeks and 4 days,no cramps no pain but i also wanna throw up and no appetite all day. Is this a sign of a miscarriage.we r currently 1 hour away from a hospital..please help scared
title: bloody string type mucas miscarriage?
